reference_summary:
Sid the Science Kid: Sid in Motion Sid the Science Kid (Actor), Katy Garretson (Director), David Gumpel (Director) & 0 more Rated: Unrated Format: DVD Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Kids & Family ["Sid the Science Kid ™ is trying out his new dance, Sid Slide to the Side, on his hardwood floors when he discovers that friction prevents him from sliding in his sneakers. When he plays ball, he quickly learns that if a ball doesn't have enough elasticity, it won't bounce! This calls for some serious investigating! After pretending to be Super Sid by kicking the ball with all his might, Sid and his friends take a trip to the Science Center to investigate how using lots of force makes things move far and fast! Join Sid and his friends as they explore the laws of motion!"] {'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8646994', 'Director': 'Katy Garretson, David Gumpel', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Animated, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 minute', 'Release date': 'January 10, 2012', 'Actors': 'Sid the Science Kid', 'Studio': 'Ncircle', 'Number of discs': '1'} Sid the science kid is a must for young kids. My grandson starting watching it at age three and has picked up an amazing vocabulary and science concepts. I find it entertaining, too. Quick delivery, reliable seller. One of the best! Sid the Science Kid: Sense-Ational Adventures Sid and Friends (Actor), The Jim Henson Company (Director) Rated: Unrated Format: DVD Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Kids & Family ["Did you hear that? Can you see this? What's that smell? Sid and his friends are embarking on a quest to explore vision, hearing, touch, smell and taste! Sid wonders why the tag on his shirt is really itchy so his class explores all the different textures around them. Sid is curious about why Grandma's glasses help her see clearly, but make things blurry for him. But when it comes to hearing, is it possible that Sid has super powers? Find out all about Sid's Super Duper Senses and find out about your own senses in these sense-sational stories!"] {'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': '6313446', 'Director': 'The Jim Henson Company', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 55 minutes', 'Release date': 'January 4, 2011', 'Actors': 'Sid and Friends', 'Studio': 'Ncircle', 'Number of discs': '1'} Sid the science kid is a must for young kids. My grandson starting watching it at age three and has picked up an amazing vocabulary and science concepts. I find it entertaining, too. Quick delivery, reliable seller. Sid is GREAT!!!! McCabe & Mrs. Miller Warren Beatty (Actor), Julie Christie (Actor), Robert Altman (Director, Writer) & 0 more Rated: R Format: DVD Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Warner Home Video, All Titles ['A frontier gambler and madam protect their booming business from outside investors. Directed by Robert Altman.'] {'Aspect Ratio': '2.35:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.75 x 5.5 x 0.5 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Director': 'Robert Altman', 'Media Format': 'Anamorphic, Closed-captioned, Color, DVD, Subtitled, Widescreen, NTSC', 'Run time': '2 hours and 1 minute', 'Release date': 'June 4, 2002', 'Actors': 'Warren Beatty, Julie Christie, Rene Auberjonois, William Devane, John Schuck', 'Subtitles': 'English, Spanish, French, Portuguese, Japanese', 'Language': 'Unqualified (DTS ES 6.1), French (Dolby Digital 2.0), English (Dolby Digital 2.0)', 'Studio': 'Warner Home Video', 'Writers': 'Edmund Naughton, Robert Altman, Brian McKay', 'Number of discs': '1'} If you are a Beatty and Christy fan, you will enjoy this movie. My favorite part is the music, a lot of songs sung by Leonard Cohen.
Worth watching for the scenery and music! One of my favorites Broadway Musicals: A Jewish Legacy Joel Grey (Actor), Michael Kantor (Director) Rated: NR Format: DVD Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Documentary ['Recent Peabody Award winner as seen on PBS', "Performances by Matthew Broderick, Kelli O'Hara, Zero Mostel, Nathan Lane, Barbra Streisand, Idina Menzel, Kristin Chenoweth, and many more Engaging, humorous, and provocative,", 'Broadway Musicals: A Jewish Legacy', "examines the unique role of Jewish composers and lyricists in the creation of the modern American musical. The film showcases the work of legends such as Irving Berlin, Jerome Kern, George and Ira Gershwin, Lorenz Hart, Richard Rodgers, Oscar Hammerstein II, Leonard Bernstein, and Stephen Sondheim. Interviews with songwriters and luminaries including Sheldon Harnick, Stephen Schwartz, Harold Prince, Arthur Laurents, Charles Strouse, and Mel Brooks provide insight, alongside standout performances and archival footage. Narrated by Tony® and Academy Award® winner Joel Grey, this entertaining documentary mingles cultural history with illuminating perspectives on the origins and meanings of some of Broadway's most beloved songs, stories, and shows."] {'Genre': 'Special Interests', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Joel Grey, Michael Kantor', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 24 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '26355977', 'Director': 'Michael Kantor', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 24 minutes', 'Release date': 'May 7, 2013', 'Actors': 'Joel Grey', 'Studio': 'Acorn', 'Number of discs': '2'} This has great songs and music and raw footage of the old stars. It was both very informative and enjoyable! Wonderful DVD Crazy from the Heart [VHS] Format: VHS Tape Movies & TV, Featured Categories ["A small-town, high-school principal still living at home with her mother shakes up her life in a way that even she never expected when she agrees to go out on a date with her school's Hispanic janitor."] {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.32 x 4.19 x 1.12 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'VHS'} Wonderful film, now available on DVD, do a google search! and It's worth what you have to pay for it! Great film, now on DVD Jane Eyre [DVD] Mia Wasikowska (Actor), Michael Fassbender (Actor), Cary Joji Fukunaga (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Drama {'Genre': 'Drama, Romance, Arthouse', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Color, Dolby, Dubbed, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': "Jamie Bell, Michael O'Connor, Sally Hawkins, Tamzin Merchant, Michael Fassbender, Alison Owen, Romy Settbon Moore, Judi Dench, Mia Wasikowska, Holliday Grainger, Amelia Clarkson, Moira Buffini, Imogen Poots, Paul Trijbits, Freya Parks, Cary Joji FukunagaJamie Bell, Michael O'Connor, Sally Hawkins, Tamzin Merchant, Michael Fassbender, Alison Owen, Romy Settbon Moore, Judi Dench, Mia Wasikowska, Holliday Grainger, Amelia Clarkson, Moira Buffini, Imogen Poots, Paul Trijbits, Freya Parks, Cary Joji Fukunaga See more", 'Initial release date': '2017-07-04', 'Language': 'English'} Ok film. Actors just so-so. There are a lot better versions around. And nothing can compare to the original with Orson Welles and
Joan Fontaine. Not my favorite Jane Eyre Sid the Science Kid: Weather Kid Sid Sid (Actor, Director) Rated: NR Format: DVD Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Kids & Family ["*Teachers' Choice Award: Excellence in Classroom Products 2014* Rain, rain, go away; Sid the Science Kid wants to play! Sid s not too happy when rain threatens to squash his play date outside. But the more Sid learns about the rain, the more he understands how important precipitation is. In fact Sid is learning about all kinds of weather patterns and how it affects our world. At school Sid studies the sun and how it lights up our world. At home, Sid s family visits relatives where it s really chilly. Brrrr! It s cold in here... Sid hits the science lab to discover that wind, rain and sun can be fascinating and fun!"] {'Genre': 'Kids & Family', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Color, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Sid', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'Number Of Discs': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '100376', 'Director': 'Sid', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 55 minutes', 'Release date': 'December 1, 2009', 'Actors': 'Sid', 'Studio': 'Sid Science Kid', 'Number of discs': '1'} Good for 3-4 year olds. Teaches a lot about science and new terminology. My 3 year old Grandson loved him!. Grandson loves him. Andrew Lloyd Webber's Love Never Dies [DVD] Ben Lewis (Actor), Anna O'Byrne (Actor), Brett Sullivan (Director, Producer) & 0 more Rated: NR Format: DVD Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Drama ["Set 10 years later, the Phantom has escaped from Paris to New York where he lives amongst the joy rides and freak shows of Coney Island. He has finally found a place for his music to soar, all that is missing is his love Christine Daaé. In a bid to win back her love, the Phantom lures Christine, her husband Raoul, and their young son Gustave from Manhattan, to the glittering and glorious world of Coney Island... they have no idea what lies in store for them... You truly haven't experienced Andrew Lloyd Webber's Love Never Dies until you see this spectacular new Australian production, filmed at Melbourne's iconic Regent Theatre.", 'Bonus Content:', 'The Making of Love Never Dies', 'The Making of Love Never Dies', ']]>'] {'Genre': 'Musicals, Arts, Culture & Entertainment, Arthouse', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': "Maria Mercedes, Ben Lewis, Simon Gleeson, Brett Sullivan, Anna O'Byrne, Clayton Jacobsen, Sharon MillerchipMaria Mercedes, Ben Lewis, Simon Gleeson, Brett Sullivan, Anna O'Byrne, Clayton Jacobsen, Sharon Millerchip See more", 'Initial release date': '2012-05-29', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), English (Dolby Digital 2.0)', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.35:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Item model number': '25148870', 'Director': 'Brett Sullivan', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '2 hours and 1 minute', 'Release date': 'May 29, 2012', 'Actors': "Ben Lewis, Anna O'Byrne, Maria Mercedes, Simon Gleeson, Sharon Millerchip", 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish', 'Producers': 'Clayton Jacobsen, Brett Sullivan', 'Studio': 'Studio Distribution Services', 'Number of discs': '1'} I am a big Phantom fan so when this came out I was eager to have it. It is similar in tone and style and continues story line. Somehow just not as good as original...takes place in Coney Island, NY. Interesting sequel The Phantom of the Opera at the Royal Albert Hall Ramin Karimloo (Actor), Sierra Boggess (Actor) Rated: NR Format: DVD Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Musicals ['In celebration of the 25th Anniversary of Andrew Lloyd Webber’s', 'The Phantom of the Opera', ', Cameron Mackintosh produced a unique, spectacular staging of the musical on a scale which had never been seen before. Inspired by the original staging by Hal Prince and Gillian Lynne, this lavish, fully-staged production set in the sumptuous Victorian splendour of London’s legendary Royal Albert Hall features a cast and orchestra of over 200, plus some very special guest appearances.'] {'Genre': 'Musicals, Arts, Culture & Entertainment', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, AC-3, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Gareth Snook, Andrew Lloyd Webber, Hadley Fraser, Wynne Evans, Sierra Boggess, Barry James, Liz Robertson, Sergei Polunin, Ramin Karimloo, Wendy FergusonGareth Snook, Andrew Lloyd Webber, Hadley Fraser, Wynne Evans, Sierra Boggess, Barry James, Liz Robertson, Sergei Polunin, Ramin Karimloo, Wendy Ferguson See more', 'Initial release date': '2012-02-07', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), English (Dolby Digital 2.0)', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.78:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.26 Ounces', 'Item model number': '24185086', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, AC-3, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '2 hours and 40 minutes', 'Release date': 'February 7, 2012', 'Actors': 'Ramin Karimloo, Sierra Boggess, Hadley Fraser, Wendy Ferguson, Barry James', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, French', 'Studio': 'Studio Distribution Services', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} Love the music Four Stars Masterpiece: Downton Abbey Season 6 Hugh Bonneville, Laura Carmichael, Michelle Dockery, Maggie Smith, Jim Carter (Actor), . Five Stars Jesus Christ Superstar Ted Neeley (Actor), Carl Anderson (Actor), Norman Jewison (Director, Producer, Writer) & 0 more Rated: G Format: DVD Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Drama ["This dazzling interpretation of the hit Tim Rice - Andrew Lloyd Webber rock opera tells the story of Christ's (Ted Neeley) final weeks in a bold and epic production. Shot entirely on location in Israel, producer-director Norman Jewison creates a brilliant example of modern movie making with groundbreaking vision and the unforgettable songs of Rice and Webber. Nominated for several Golden Globe Awards including Best Picture, Best Actor and Best Actress, this legendary classic is now a must-have Special Edition.Bonus Content:", 'An Exclusive Interview with Master Lyricist Tim Rice', 'An Exclusive Interview with Master Lyricist Tim Rice', 'Feature Commentary with Directory Norman Jewison and Actor Ted Neeley', 'Feature Commentary with Directory Norman Jewison and Actor Ted Neeley', 'Photo Gallery', 'Photo Gallery'] {'Genre': 'Musicals & Performing Arts, Drama, DVD Movie, Special Interests/Religion & Spirituality, Blu-ray MovieMusicals & Performing Arts, Drama, DVD Movie, Special Interests/Religion & Spirituality, Blu-ray Movie See more', 'Format': 'Anamorphic, Color, DTS Surround Sound, Dolby, NTSC, Special Edition, Subtitled, Widescreen, Dubbed', 'Contributor': 'Ted Neeley, Barry Dennen, Yvonne Elliman, Bob Bingham, Larry T. profile:
**Updated User Summary:**

- **Target Audience**: The user focuses on enriching children's educational content for preschoolers while also having an appreciation for high-quality films and Broadway musicals.
- **Content Preference**: They continue to prefer animated, science-oriented shows and high-quality dramas. The recent interaction with a film reflects their appreciation for strong performances and engaging narratives, suggesting they enjoy thoroughly crafted storytelling. The user maintains a preference for stage productions over film adaptations, valuing authenticity in theatrical storytelling.
- **Review Behavior**: The user consistently provides detailed and constructive reviews that highlight educational value, entertainment quality, and emotional resonance. Their enthusiasm for impactful storytelling and strong performances reveals a thoughtful engagement with various genres, showcasing an evolving taste that accommodates both uplifting and sophisticated content.
- **Emotional Connection**: They emphasize experiences shared with their grandchild, focusing on educational development and enjoyment derived from media consumption, influencing their content choices.
- **Engagement Level**: The user actively seeks intellectually stimulating content, showing a clear preference for entertaining and enriching pieces. They are drawn to narratives that resonate with both adult and family audiences, demonstrating an openness to a diverse range of storytelling styles.

Overall, the user prioritizes quality storytelling that engages and educates, fostering enriching media experiences for preschoolers and their families while remaining receptive to both traditional and innovative narratives.
